sneaker.name: Jordan 1 Red

sneaker.name: Jordan 1 Travis Scott
sneaker.description: Travis Scott collabed Jordan 1's, cactus jack style

sneaker.name: Jordan 1 Blue
sneaker.description: Blue Jordan 1's, the reverse style to the red's, it's bold

sneaker.name: Jordan 4 BlackCat
sneaker.description: Jordan 4 BlackCat's, the blackout J's stealthy like a black cat

sneaker.name: Jordan 4 Bled
sneaker.description: Jordan 4 Bled's, mainly black with a hint of red and grey, it's that simple

sneaker.name: Jordan 4 Grey
sneaker.description: Jordan 4 grey's, all grey all day

sneaker.name: Yeezy Oreo
sneaker.description: Yeezy Oreo's, black Yeezy's with a stripe of cream oreo style

sneaker.name: Yeezy Beluga
sneaker.description: Yeezy Beluga's, grey like the whale they're named after

sneaker.name: Airmax 97 JDW
sneaker.description: The Airmax 97 Sean Wotherspoon's, yellow, pink, blue and black all in one
